sourcesContent:
import { Button } from "@chakra-ui/button";
import { Image } from "@chakra-ui/image";
import { Input } from "@chakra-ui/input";
import { Box, Flex, Heading, Spacer, Stack, Text } from "@chakra-ui/layout";
import { Tab, TabList, TabPanel, TabPanels, Tabs } from "@chakra-ui/tabs";
import { ChangeEvent, useState, VFC } from "react";
import { useCurrentLoginUser } from "../../hooks/useCurrentLoginUser";

export const Setting: VFC = () => {
    const {loginUser} = useCurrentLoginUser();
    const [password, setPassword] = useState("");
    const [username, setUsername] = useState("");

    const onChangeEditPassword = (event: ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement>) => setPassword(event.target.value);
    const onChangeEditUsername = (event: ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement>) => setUsername(event.target.value);

    return (
        <>
            <Box backgroundColor="teal.600" display={{base: "none", sm: "block"}} position="fixed" w="100%">
                <Box ml={2}>
                    <Heading fontSize="3xl" color="whiteAlpha.800" p={2}>Setting</Heading>
                </Box>
            </Box>
            <Box ml={{sm: "80"}} mt={{base: "6", lg: "28"}}>
                <Flex>
                    <Box>
                        <Stack spacing={1}>
                            <Box>
                                <Text fontWeight="bold">E-Mail</Text>
                                <Input readOnly value={loginUser.email}/>
                            </Box>
                            <Box>
                                <Text fontWeight="bold">Password</Text>
                                <Input type="password" value={password} onChange={onChangeEditPassword}/>
                            </Box>
                            <Box>
                                <Text fontWeight="bold">Username</Text>
                                <Input value={username} onChange={onChangeEditUsername}/>
                            </Box>
                            <Box textAlign="right">
                                <Button backgroundColor="gray.400">変更</Button>
                            </Box>
                        </Stack>
                    </Box>
                    <Box textAlign="center" mt={4} ml={4}>
                        <Image boxSize="150px" borderRadius="full" src="https://source.unsplash.com/random" alt=""/>
                        <Button backgroundColor="whiteAlpha.900" mt={6} _hover={{opacity: "0.8"}}>変更</Button>
                    </Box>
                </Flex>
                <Box mt={12}>
                    <Tabs>
                        <TabList>
                            <Tab>フォロー</Tab>
                            <Tab>フォロワー</Tab>
                        </TabList>
                        <TabPanels>
                            <TabPanel></TabPanel>
                            <TabPanel></TabPanel>
                        </TabPanels>
                    </Tabs>
                </Box>
            </Box>
        </>
    );
};
